Summary: saw silver, red and white disc while riding in car on way to campsite. It hovered over the trees and disappeared as we drove away.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around June 30th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile riding in the car with my dad and sister, my sister pointed out a disc over the tree tops. It was red, white and silver. We watched it hover over the trees and lost sight of it in the trees. This was around 11:00 am in the summer of 2003 while we were driving to our campsite.
